biblStruct.note: Life of St. Febronia of Nisibis – the oldest medieval monument of the novelistic type. The article discusses the text of the two Slavic translations of the Life of Febronia of Nisibis in comparison with The Tale from the life of Peter and Fevronia of Murom. The author comes to the following conclusions: first, these two monuments certainly share a common Christian context, and secondly, Life could serve as one of the models for Еrmolai-Erasmus, especially in addressing the theme of female Holiness, and thirdly, to argue that Life is a direct source of The Tale, is hardly possible.
